General.Name: Elcora Advanced Materials Corp
General.Description: Elcora Advanced Materials Corp., engages in the exploration of mineral properties in Canada. The company was formerly known as Elcora Resources Corp. and changed its name to Elcora Advanced Materials Corp. in February 2016. Elcora Advanced Materials Corp. was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Bedford, Canada.
General.Address: 111 Ahmadi Crescent, Bedford, NS, Canada, B4A 4E5

1.Name: Mr. Johannes Petrus Matheus van der Linde CPA, CA
1.Title: CFO, Director & Company Sec.
